column4: I'm getting a ton of messages like "Failed to fetch http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/feisty-security/main/binary-i386/Packages.gz  400 Bad request" when I do a "sudo apt-get update"
Is there something up with the servers, or is it on my side?
i don't know, but you might just try again later in case the server is getting clogged.  or you can set it to fetch from the us. or other servers
